Room.Name: Ashton River Road/Foothills Trail Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Ashton River Road, which runs east and west, and the Foothills Trail, which takes a southeast course.
Room.LongDescription: A sign post points southeast and says the dwarven mining community of Nyyron is a few kilometers in that direction. There are rolling hills in between, so you cannot see any sign of buildings in that direction.
